sentences.sContent: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.sCn: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

sentences.sContent: ...Strength，softness and thickness remain the leading indicators of toilet paper quality...
...or will choose to remain in the city center...
...but also our ability to remain globally competitive...
...they remain fussy―in theory at least—when it comes to paper quality...
...pool negotiators remain like that and go on losing negotiations...
...but it may be that some smaller towns inland remain not very well connected...
...Some parts of Shakespeare's life will always remain unknown...
...Why does the speaker say parts of Shakespeare's life will remain a mystery...
...What controls remain for the users will be audio-based...
...But functioning fireplaces remain to this day a powerful selling point in a house or apartment...

synos.tran: 保持；依然；留下；剩余；逗留；残存

phrases.pCn: 保持冷静，保持镇静；面不改色

words.tran: [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人

trans.tranOther: to stay in the same place without moving away

trans.tranCn: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
trans.tranOther: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed
